titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation declaring His Majesties grace and favour towards all commanders and seamen to prizes and prize-goods seized and taken since the month of January, 1642, until the twenty ninth of May, 1660.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Hampton-Court, the fourteenth day of July, 1662 in the fourteenth year of our reign."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
